data.title: Henri-Georges Clouzot: The Enlightened Tyrant
data.meta_description: This 2004 documentary gives an overview of director Henri-Georges Clouzot’s background and film career. It includes interviews with Clouzot’s second wife, Inès; his brother Marcel; actors Suzy Delair and Brigitte Bardot; and assistant director Michel Romanoff.
data.text:
Watch this video and more on The Criterion Channel
